ygData.subject: Re: CE: Druids and Faeries
ygData.msgSnippet: Something else I would like to mention: I believe a druid s spells of protection should be tied to a character s health.  For example, an exp level 1 faerie

Something else I would like to mention: I believe a druid's spells of 
protection should be tied to a character's health.  For example, an 
exp level 1 faerie can only have one spell of protection placed on it 
due to its low health value.  Characters with greater health will be 
allowed to have more spells of protection around them.

There should be a limit to how many spells of protection a character 
can have on it.  You shouldn't have fuzzy images in the place of 
character surrounded by spells of protection.

Of course, when a character dies, all spells of protection around the 
character should disappear.
